name: Forest of Doom - Demo
description:
In this  3D over-the-shoulder RPG, a knight,  a bomber-man, and a mage need your help in escaping a dark, uncanny, and dangerous forest.

This is a large work-in progress project, thus is only a DEMO of one level.

Any form of feedback/criticism is accepted! Enjoy :)

General Controls:

  • WASD: Move
  • Primary Attack: Right Mouse
  • Secondary Attack: Left Mouse
  • Pause: ESC
  • Switch Characters: Q(left), E(right)

_____________________________________________________________________________________

Character Abilities:

  • Knight: Attack(primary), Shield(secondary)
  • Bomber-man: Regular Throw(primary), Fast Throw(secondary)
  • Mage: Mark enemies(primary), Heal(secondary)

_____________________________________________________________________________________

Drops:

  • Big Bag/Little Bag: 10 and 50 coins respectively
  • Red Bottle: Mana (for mage only)
  • Bomb: Bomb refill (for bomber-man only)
  • Green Heart: HP
